citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:00 pm on
October 22, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the doors and calling the number listed
on the account. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the
AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:00 pm on 
October 22, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the doors and calling the number listed 
on the account. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the 
AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
